parameters.age_wife_at_marriage: Age of wife at the time they married.
parameters.age_husb_at_marriage: Age of husband at the time they married.

description:
Description
The Great Britain Office of Population Census and Surveys once collected
data on a random sample of 170 married couples in Britain, recording the age
(in years) and heights of the husbands and wives.
title: Great Britain: husband and wife pairs
reference: Hand DJ. 1994. A handbook of small data sets. Chapman & Hall/CRC.
format: A data frame with 199 observations on the following 8 variables.
